::Zardus/Oblitertron::

Zardus ducks under a rocket, growling as a bolt hits him in the abdomen. He 
removes it, tossing it down to the ground.

Ignoring the burning feeling coming from his stomach, Zardus fires back at 
Starlight with his plasma launcher, growling.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Oblitertron laughs, ignoring the pain as shots hit his heavilly armored 
torso, making dents but not much more.

He turns to Fenox, firing his rifle at her while he fired his optics at 
Astral.
